about_the_game:
Egyptians DLC for Clip Maker contain Egyptian style characters. You can make excellent art images, manga, visual novels, stories, comics, videos, films and clips. Or just have a fun with:

Anubis
Bastet
Mummy2
Mummy pharaoh
Necromancer warrior
Nefertiti
Ra
Rebel pharaoh
Seth god of Egypt
Sobek
Sphinx Kross

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the menu where you are making settings of the timeline.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

name: Egyptians for Clip maker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Egyptians for Clip maker - get a revolutionary new game and have fun by creating your own 3D video stories, films, clips, art images, manga, visual novels, stories, comics and videos or just have a fun.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
